vlive.korean: 우리 원스 친절해! ONCE, you're so kind! 듣기 View video TWICE : 힝
남들한테도 이렇게 친절해요? Are you kind to others too? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자가 직진하는 이유 [나의 이름에게] - EP.04
vlive.english: Are you kind to others too?

vlive.korean: 그럼 더 친절해지는 그날까지 우리 계속 봐요! I'll do my best. See you later! 듣기 View video SSONGYANG : 화장초보] 꼬막눈 교정 성형 메이크업 | 아이메이크업 / 눈화장 이쁘게하는법 / eyemakeup
vlive.english: I'll do my best. See you later!

vlive.korean: 제가 최대한 친절하게 해보려고 노력은 했는데 그게... I tried my best to be kind. 듣기 View video SSONGYANG : 분위기 뽱! 가을 메이크업 with 신상템 #겟레디윗미 | 또말많이했...🙄 / 셀레피트 팔레트
vlive.english: I tried my best to be kind.

vlive.korean: 친절이 뭐 게임이에요? 못하게? Being kind is not a game. You can't be bad at it. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 남자가 직진하는 이유 [나의 이름에게] - EP.04
vlive.english: Being kind is not a game. You can't be bad at it.

examples.korean: The hotel staff are friendly and attentive. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 호텔 직원들은 친절하고 세심하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel staff are friendly and attentive. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The hotel staff are friendly and courteous. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 호텔 직원들은 친절하고 정중하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hotel staff are friendly and courteous. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His landlady was a kind, homely woman. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 집주인 아주머니는 친절하고 따뜻한 분이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His landlady was a kind, homely woman. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His kindness did not go unnoticed by his staff. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 친절을 그의 직원들이 간과하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His kindness did not go unnoticed by his staff. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was accused of fraternizing with the enemy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 적에게 친절하게 대했다는 비난을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was accused of fraternizing with the enemy. Add to Wordbook
